extendedInfo.description: Fearless Mobility is a VPN client preconfigured to access a VPN service, providing the following functionality.No setup or registration required--------------------------------When you have installed Fearless Mobility you can instantly connect to the VPN service, no manual configuration is required.Privacy--------------------------------With Fearless Mobility, your traffic will be encrypted from your client to our VPN servers. This means that you will be protected from eavesdropping even if you are using a public WiFi.The VPN service also enables you to surf the Internet without anyone knowing your true IPNo application restrictions--------------------------------Some ISPs have restrictions preventing you from using  applications such as Skype. When using Fearless Mobility, it is not possible to enforce such restrictions.No content restrictions--------------------------------Some countries block you from reaching certain sites. Our VPN servers are placed in the EU, where no such restrictions exist. The VPN service is currently offered as a fully functional free trial until commercial launch, targeted for Q4 2012. When the service is commercially launched, there will be a monthly fee (TBD) if you choose to sign up. If you do not wish to continue using the service, you are not required to take any action.Authenticate using a Google account--------------------------------In order to use the service you will have to authenticate using a Google account. If you do not have a Google account, you can create one athttps://accounts.google.com/SignUpPlease note that we do not store any of your credentials, they are only passed on to Google for verification. If you are concerned about using your existing Google account please feel free to create a new account and use this for the Fearless Mobility Service.When prompted by the VPN client on your Android device to enter your Google account name and password, please enter your Google account name (e.g. john.doe@gmail.com) and password.If you have trouble logging in, please follow the link below to configure your Google account to allow a new application to access your account from a new location:https://accounts.google.com/DisplayUnlockCaptchaThis product includes software developed by the OpenSSL Project for use in the OpenSSL Toolkit. (http://www.openssl.org/)

reviews.title: Simple and easy
reviews.comment: I\'ve downloaded a lot of vpns for my trip to china and i have got to say THIS IS THE BEST. I\'ve been using this for only 2 days but so far it has given me the best experience. Easy to use and really works.
reviews.author: Jeff Guo

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: I created a google account just for this. It appears to be working fine. Have managed to connect to Skype perfectly. Simple and effective with no silly frills.

reviews.title: Great. Can\'t go wrong here.
reviews.comment: It\'s just awesome. Like the only one in app store that gives unlimited use and connects from any network. Nice work.

reviews.title: GREAT, THANK YOU
reviews.comment: Fast, Stable, Easy and amazingly free! it asks for a Google account, it\'s ok, you can use any Google Account not your main one necessarily. if you concerned about your privacy, you can CREAT AN ACCOUNT especially for this app. it worth the trouble I promise, highly recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This VPN is the best I\'ve used. I\'m in China so that\'s saying a lot. But it stopped working today for the first time...please fix it!!

reviews.title: The Best Vpn I used
reviews.comment: Trust me, i am a simple Droid user. I was helplessly roaming on the play store searching for a vpn that could fulfill my purpose of bypassing the wi-fi restrictions of my college..  This is it! Easy to use, hasslefree, No registrations.. Everything in a nutshell! I really thank the dev who made this..  Kudos!
